Text: ..didn't install this cauze my Skymaster's down for maintenance...yer on yer own..haa

Never heard of it, but hey it's nice! Why did it dissapear from FS memory and the stores?

Heil und Friede,
Dr. Frikadel

aahhh..Herr Doctor....very good question. From what I've been able to find....our friend Raimondo made some kind of deal with Flytampa or Simflyer about the time Midway was released....rest is history. Also....Horizon Sim - Justflight also released ChicagoVFR in the megascenery series...think all these suckers are in cahoots....and the only ones chasin the cat are us...the buyers !!!
...ALSO ...share guys......cause once its up....I'm done as you can see I can't spare the bandwidth to support these honkers...

Aha Blackbox danke for explaining. Aber Mensch I installed it and it looked kinda horrible but very retro ;) LOL I'll keep it! Just for the fun. Compare this photoscenery with the possibilities of FSX and we've come a long way!

Also gute Nacht mein Liebchen,
Dr. Frikadel

Verzeih blaNkbox ich habe nicht gewusst du bist von die "Alte Kameraden"
